member.name: P:LogoFX.Server.Bootstrapping.BootstrapperBase.ModulesPath

member.name: P:LogoFX.Server.Bootstrapping.BootstrapperBase.Prefixes
member.summary: Gets the prefixes of the modules that will be used by the module registrator during bootstrapper configuration. Use this to implement efficient discovery.

member.name: P:LogoFX.Server.Bootstrapping.BootstrapperBase.Modules
